name: Stars Wrestling Revolution 2017: Real wrestlers
description:
Stars Wrestling Revolution 2017
Let’s excite the crowd with your real wrestling fight style. Show your fighting skills and be the world greatest wrestler.

Its a Free wrestling combo game offers multi fighting experience to fans in this single game. Game is especially designed for wrestling & boxing lovers. A wrestling super stars career challenges will drive you to take risky shots in the ring. Upgrade your wrestler strength to enjoy the professional wrestling experience with unlimited fun.

You can select a wrestler of your array from multiple wrestlers. Use the touch gestures on the screen, and for each gesture have a different blow, your quickness and technique will make you a great champion. Some wrestlers might be stronger than they look, so train yourself a lot to prove your strength as a real wrestling athlete.

Download for FREE and enjoy unlimited game.
Write us back that how you liked the game.
